titlealts.searchtitle: Data Element: DIAGNOSIS (SNOMED CT RECORDED ON DISCHARGE FROM NEONATAL CRITICAL CARE) - Description

body.p: DIAGNOSIS (SNOMED CT ON NEONATAL CRITICAL CARE DAILY CARE DATE) is the same as attribute CLINICAL TERMINOLOGY CODE .
DIAGNOSIS (SNOMED CT ON NEONATAL CRITICAL CARE DAILY CARE DATE) is the SNOMED_CT ® concept ID describing a PATIENT DIAGNOSIS recorded when the PATIENT is discharged from neonatal critical care.

DIAGNOSIS (SNOMED CT RECORDED ON DISCHARGE FROM NEONATAL CRITICAL CARE) should include any PATIENT DIAGNOSES which were not recorded as expected on the applicable Neonatal Critical Care Daily Care Date during a Neonatal CRITICAL CARE PERIOD .
